name: Skymeleon
description:
This is Skymeleon, a colorful 2D pixel-art platformer, made in ten weeks as part of a college semester project.

Controls - Gamepad Required
Move - Left Joystick
Jump - 'A'
Dash - 'X' for blue, 'Y' for yellow and 'B' for red

Additional Art Credits
